title: Small freshwater fish in a tank 2

content.question: Identify TWO variables that were not specifically controlled in the experimental design, and describe how these variables might have affected the outcome of the experiment.

frqParts.text: Identify TWO variables that were not specifically controlled in the experimental design, and describe how these variables might have affected the outcome of the experiment.

skill.text: 3.C: Identify experimental procedures that align with the question, including: i. identifying dependent and independent variables ii. identifying appropriate controls iii. justifying appropriate controls
